resources.string: Last sign in invalid, please resign
EnigmaID should be start with alpha, and only with 6-20 alpha,number,underline,subtraction sign
Please scan the QR code with the signed in device.
To authorize this app from your PC App:
· Go to Settings - Privacy & Security - Device Management - New Device \n· Use this device to Scan the QR code to login

Your registration will remove the link between mobile phone %s and %s. \n\n (After disassociate,the original account can still be used normally,but the new phone number needs to be bound within 7 days,otherwise it will be deleted)

You can still login, but the login operation without synchronizing the key information will log out all the logged in devices, and the encrypted chat history will be permanently lost.\n(User profile, contact information will be retained)
This action will clear all chat history and sign out this account from all other devices.
Devices bind to this account reach to limit\nConfirm:jump to unbind device view
Bind device with signed in device please scan following QR code
1.force sign in would kick all other bind devices off
2.bind sign in would add one new device to this account bind list
Bind to account is not the same account from QR code scan, please check
This account is signing in with QR code scan
Please use the logged in device to scan the QR code above to login.
Already signed in, can not sign in twice
Devices bind to this account reach limitation, please remove one or more
Same with original phone number, update fail
The current mobile number is already associated with the user
Scan success, confirm login on other device please
The new device is requesting sign in
Enigma uses end-to-end encryption technology. Please login with your logged-in device to synchronize your key information.
Scan the QR code on the current device with another logged in mobile device
Scan the QR code on the logged-in computer device with your current device
No chat, go contacts and create chat with your friend
Can not add yourself as friend
You have confirmed the friend request.
Your friend request has been confirmed.
Network fail, please check your data connection
last seen a long time ago
%s\u0020request to add you as a friend
You need send verification, wait for target confirm
Error: The current QR code does not belong to %1$s
The key is verified, and the data is being encrypted and transmitted end-to-end
Your chat with %1$s may be monitored by a third party
Wonderful nick would be more attractive to your friend
You can use a-z, 0-9 and underscores.
You could write some description about yourself for other users know you more
Scan this QR code to join group
You will delete the contact. This action cannot be undone.
Can not add yourself as friend
You added %1$s, now you can chat
Confirm to clear all selected records?

The above information shows your chat key public key data. You can use the contact\'s mobile phone to scan the QR code above to verify, or compare the emoji or code above to verify whether the message is end-to-end encrypted.
You will delete the contact and clear the history.
Confirm remove all chats on other devices
Confirm remove all chats on this device
Sorry, app has critical exception, will abort now

For those who don\'t want to share the last online time, you won\'t be able to see them at the last online time. Instead, it is roughly the time of the launch (eg, recently, within a week, within a month).
The above settings will not follow the global settings.
Who can see my proper online state
No sound or vibrate when new message in if on
If disabled, other users cannot find you via the above info.
Users who have common groups with you can send you messages directly.
Turn on this setting to receive notifications when a contact\'s security code has changed. Your messages and calls are encrypted regardless of this setting.
if you do not come online at least once within this period, your account will be deleted along with all messages and contacts.
You can set a password that will be required when you sign in a new device in addition to the code you get in the SMS
Please enter your recovery email. It\'s the only way to recover a forgotten password.
Please check your email address and enter the six digits we sent you.
You have enabled Two-Step verification.\nyou\'ll need the password you set up here to login to your account via SMS verify code.
Passwords don\'t match. Please ease try again.
Are you sure you want to disable your password?
%d s can be sent again in seconds
Because you have two-step authentication enabled, you need to validate the password
Please check your email address %1$s and enter the six digits we sent you to turn off the 2-step verification password.
Sorry, the phone number has recently reset the account too many times. Please try again in %s
If you can\'t restore access to your email, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account.
Your password for Two-Step Verification is now active.
You have enabled Two-Step Verification, so your account is protected with an additional password.
Limit exceeded. Please try again later.

· Delete your account info and profile photo 
· Automatically exit all group 
· Delete all contacts 
· Clear all your chats and chat files 
· Release your mobile number/username 
· Automatically close Enigma
The phone number you entered does not match the current account. Please check and try again.
It cannot be retrieved by operation. If you reactivate your Enigma in the future, your data will not be restored.
If you forget your password, you will lose access to your Enigma account. There will be no way to restore it.
When you set up an unlock passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page. Tap it to lock your Enigma app. \n\nNote: If you forget the passcode, you\'ll need to delete and reinstall the app.
Show App content in Task Switcher
If disabled, you won\'t be able to take screenshots in the app but chat content will be hidden in the task switcher.\nYou may need to restart the app for this to take effect.
Are you sure to turn passcode off ?
You need to enter system fingerprints first
Save media of chat camera to gallery

Photos, videos and other files from cloud chats that you have not accessed during this period will be removed from this device to save disk space. All media will stay in the Enigma cloud and can be re-downloaded if you need it again.
New income message preview would not display if off
Confirm clear all draft on cloud?
Current version is the latest version
Download new version apk, please wait...
Download finished, please go system bar, click install
Download start, please go system bar check progress
New version apk download in progress, please wait...
Notice:this version need force upgrade, app would not work if ignore
New version package install URL invalid
You will delete the history. This action cannot be undone.
You are not in this group!
\u0020not add you as friend, you need send friend request
This user refuse chat from strangers
Audio recorder initialize failed, please check microphone permission is granted
Not media app in your device
SD card unmounted or low memory, avatar can not cache on device
Low memory, can not save this media data
Can not play video, please retry
Too large picture, memory not enough
Video record duration at least 3 seconds
Camera not work or not exist on device
%2$s join the group via the link shared by %1$s
The group owner change to %2$s by %1$s
Your are not friend of this account
%1$s\'s security code has changed, likely because %2$s reinstalled Enigma or Others use the mobile phone number to log in this account.
Delete selected messages? This action can't be undone.
Thank your spam report, click to delete chat
The opposite side has enabled friend verification, you are not his/her friend yet, please send the friend verification request first
This account is blocked, this action disabled
This version app expired, please upgrade
All messages here End-to-End encrypted.\nclick to more information
You are not in this group
Reset link would invalid current invite link and update to new one, confirm reset?
modify the group of photo to
turn on all group members as administrator
turn off all group members as administrator
upgrade the group to the super group
Do you sync recent chat messages to new members?
Confirm transfer Owner to %1$s\u0020?(can not roll back)
You can not transfer owen to yourself
The group owner change to %2$s by %1$s
join the group via the link shared by %1$s
Data not from %s, please check\nLong touch to copy to clipboard
Network fail, please check your device data connection
You not grant critical permissions, app would not work properly,please go system Setting-->Apps-->Enigma-->Permissions grant required permissions
Confirm send these Full Size pictures?
Album open in progress, please wait
Not got data of this location
Can not select picture and video at one time
Only one video at one send
Media files do not exist or are damaged
Only single select at Reply action
File size beyond limitation(max %s), can not send
Apk install permission should grant manually at Android version 8.0 and later
You not grant notice permission, go setting?
Revoked a message from other member
Phone number illegal, please check and retry
Operate too frequently, please take a rest
You can change your number here. Your account and all your cloud data — messages, media, contacts, etc. will be moved to the new number.
Messages to this chat are now secured with end-to-end encryption.Tap for more info.
Load fail, click me to retry
Database init fail, please relaunch app
Data file is abnormal, please login again
The database version is too low and the App must be upgraded to work properly
The function is not open yet
Scan the QR code to add me on Enigma
Since you didn\'t provide a recovery email when setting up your password, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account.
There are currently no features available. More features are under development.
This feature allows you to modify the contact\'s avatar, nickname and ID. You will see your modified information on your device.
